name: Rural Rental Housing Loans
objective: To provide economically designed and constructed rental and cooperative housing and related facilities suited for rural residents.
assistance_types: State (includes District of Columbia, public institutions of higher education and hospitals)
applicant_types: Local (includes State-designated Indian Tribes, excludes institutions of higher education and hospitals
Private nonprofit institution/organization (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)
Public nonprofit institution/organization (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)
Specialized group (e.g. health professionals, students, veterans)
State (includes District of Columbia, public institutions of higher education and hospitals)
U.S. Territories and possessions (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)

results.description: In FY 2024, the Agency received 7 applications and obligated 7 subsequent loans.  The Agency did not receive any new construction loan applications.
